Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/State
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted Eastbound via 63rd, Yale, 67th, State and 63rd; Westbound via 63rd, State, 59th, Yale & 63rd due to police activity near 63rd/State

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near 63rd/State.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Yale, 67th, State and 63rd.
  • Westbound buses will operate via  63rd, State, 59th, Yale and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near 63rd/State
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 59th, Yale, 67th and State due to police activity near 63rd/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 59th, Yale, 67th and State due to police activity near 63rd/State.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
